installation.description: foret is served as an npm package. Add them to your project by running:

troubleShooting.title: Trouble Shooting
troubleShooting.description: If you experience any issues while getting set up with Foret React / Angular, please head over to the GitHub repo for more guidelines and support. Please create an issue if your issue does not already exist.

designPrinciple.principle2Description: Not only should it look comfortable in appearance, it should also feel comfortable in usability.
designPrinciple.principle3Description: It must not splash. The role of each design element should be taken for granted and naturally.

button.title: Button
button.description: Buttons are used to initialize an action. Button labels express what action will occur when the user interacts with it.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the Button will be disabled.
